name: h3
description: The 2025 Marucci Code Drop 10 USSSA Baseball Bat is engineered for players seeking a powerful yet controlled swing, thanks to its mid-loaded swing feel and one-piece alloy construction. Certified by BBCOR .50, this bat features a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, crafted from robust AZ75 alloy for all-season durability. Its ring-free barrel construction and multi-variable wall design work together to enhance barrel flex and expand the sweet spot, ensuring a more forgiving performance even on off-centered hits. Finished in a striking black, lime, and white colorway, the bat also incorporates an AV2 knob with a harmonic dampening system, delivering an improved feel with reduced vibrations. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on all orders
